name: Mr Lucky Raphala
profile: Results-oriented Christian leader with a passion for fostering a collaborative and prayerful work environment. Leverage extensive indirect tax expertise in research analysis, investigations, enforcement, and Customs & Excise regulations to achieve strategic objectives. Proven ability to translate vision into actionable plans and collaborate with executives to set the organization's strategic direction. Excellent client service skills ensure strong relationships and effective communication.
verse: Romans 12:6-8 We have different gifts according to the grace given to each of us. If your gift is prophesying, then prophesy in accordance with your faith. If it is serving, then serve; if it is teaching, then teach; If your gift is to encourage, then give encouragement; if it is giving, then give generously, if it is to lead, do it diligently; if it is to show mercy, do it cheerfully.
